ygData.subject: Re: Source for Combine Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No gypsies on Faydwer (well, no gypsies who will sell you anything =) The ones that are hardest to miss during your travels are the Oasis gypsies and the N
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Source for Combine Weapons
>Date: Tue, 29 Jun 1999 11:22:40 -0400
>
>From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
>
>I've found the gypsy camp in the Oasis of Marr where I can buy Combine
>weapons. Is there such a source anywhere in Faydwer?
>
> Thrush

No gypsies on Faydwer (well, no gypsies who will sell you anything =)
The ones that are hardest to miss during your travels are the Oasis gypsies
and the N Karana gypsies...just be careful when shopping (handy to have a
person keeping a lookout). There are a few more camps, but you'll have to
find those unless someone else feels like posting the locations =)

Sartori D'Elsiraa
Bard of Kelethin of the 30th Chorus
Veeshan
